description: Displays information about the AWS re:Post Private private re:Post.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: clientId
nested_items.description: The Identity Center identifier for the Application Instance.

nested_items.name: configurationStatus
nested_items.description: The configuration status of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: contentSize
nested_items.description: The content size of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: createDateTime
nested_items.description: The date when the private re:Post was created.

nested_items.name: customerRoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role that grants permissions to the private re:Post to convert unanswered questions into AWS support tickets.

nested_items.name: deleteDateTime
nested_items.description: The date when the private re:Post was deleted.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: groupAdmins
nested_items.description: The list of groups that are administrators of the private re:Post.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: randomDomain
nested_items.description: The AWS generated subdomain of the private re:Post.
(string) ---
(list) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: spaceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The creation or deletion status of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: storageLimit
nested_items.description: The storage limit of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: tier
nested_items.description: The pricing tier of the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: userAdmins
nested_items.description: The list of users that are administrators of the private re:Post.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: userCount
nested_items.description: The number of users that have onboarded to the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: userKMSKey
nested_items.description: The custom AWS KMS key ARN that's used for the AWS KMS encryption.

nested_items.name: vanityDomain
nested_items.description: The custom subdomain that you use to access your private re:Post. All custom subdomains must be approved by AWS before use.

nested_items.name: vanityDomainStatus
nested_items.description: The approval status of the custom subdomain.
